readable.title: 2734219983_fe86a60bf9
readable.content: A woman and child with an umbrella walk through the street in the pouring rain . a woman in a colorful sari walks with a small boy who is carrying an umbrella through a busy city in the pouring rain . A woman in a sari next to a boy holding a red umbrella in a rainy street A woman walking in the rain with a child . The lady and child walk to school in the rain .
